dialogue.introduction: My name is Kisaragi. Please keep me by your side.
dialogue.library_intro: The second ship of Mutsuki-class, Kisaragi. At Wake Island, I fought bravely under the attack of annoying F4F Fighters Nooo~ really ...the sea breeze will ruin my hair.
dialogue.secretary2: Eh? Hmmm... I'm ready any time.
dialogue.secretary3: Geez... You always like it, admiral.
dialogue.secretarymarried: Sometimes, I find myself staring at your face. It's my favorite type of face! J~ust kidding.
dialogue.wedding: Nn~, it was all just pretend, truthfully. All I really wanted to do was just gaze out at the ocean with you. Fufu, J~ust kidding!
dialogue.joining_a_fleet: 30th Destroyer Division, Kisaragi, reporting for duty!
dialogue.equipment1: Look at my beautiful skin... you should take a closer look.
dialogue.equipment2: Hehe, stronger and more beautiful, right?
dialogue.supply: If it's you, admiral...thank you...I like it.
dialogue.docking_minor_damage: I'm feeling a little tired, so I'll have a rest in bed. Would you like to join me?
dialogue.docking_moderate_damage: But I want to be with you for as long as I can... let's have you resting with me.
dialogue.docking_complete: Looks like a ship is fully repaired.
dialogue.ship_construction: Hnnn...I hope the newcomer's a cute girl..
dialogue.return_from_sortie: The fleet has returned. We were able to perform maneuvers safely, thank goodness.
dialogue.start_a_sortie: You'll let me come too... right?
dialogue.attack: Torpedoes sure are thick... here I go!
dialogue.night_battle: If you fall for the remodeled Kisaragi, I'll have to do it ♥
dialogue.night_attack: Aren't you such a problem child? Kisaragi gonna make you feel better ♪
dialogue.artillery_spotting: Aren't you such a problem child? Kisaragi gonna make you feel better ♪
dialogue.night_special_attack_modifier_cutin_at_n: Aren't you such a problem child? Kisaragi gonna make you feel better ♪
dialogue.support_expedition_team_arrival: Aren't you such a problem child? Kisaragi gonna make you feel better ♪
dialogue.mvp: Aaah~ Kisaragi is the best? Well, I suppose that's normal. Its fine~ Its fine, there's no need for excessive praise.
dialogue.moderately_damaged: What... are you trying to do to me?
dialogue.valentines_day_2015: He–re you go♡ Chocolates filled with my feelings, make sure you eat every last one, 'kay?
dialogue.white_day_2015: Huh, Mutsuki, you're giving these cookies to me?... Thank you.... I'll eat them with appreciation. Fufufufu.
dialogue.second_anniversary_2015: Commander, today is the two years anniversary. Really, I was surprised too. Let's celebrate for today just the two of us.
dialogue.rainy_season_2015: My! Your teruteru-bouzu is really cute, Mutsuki-chan. There is one for Kisaragi too? Thank you!
dialogue.early_summer_2015: It'll be summer soon~. Maybe I should go buy a new swimsuit.... Hey, which do you think is good~?
dialogue.midsummer_2015: Hey, let's go to the beach! Ah, of course not in our equipments or clothes. Okay? How does my swimsuit look?
dialogue.christmas_2015: Ufufu~ Mutsuki-chan, Christmas cake is delicious, isn't it? Have a taste of this turkey as well.
dialogue.end_of_year_2015: I see, it's already December. It's cleaning season. Oh no, my hair will go bad.
dialogue.new_year_2016: Happy New Year! Please do take care of me and the others this year as well.
dialogue.setsubun_2016: We throw this bean, right? Hyaah... Oh my, did I hit somewhere strange?
